website_summaries.verdict: Similar in looks and capacity to Bosch's top-of-the-line model but lacks a few of its features.
pros: Holds up to 16 place settings and features six wash settings
Also has a stainless steel interior but is a bit louder than our top pick, at 42 dBA
Cleans dishes thoroughly and is reasonably quiet
Has an InfoLight feature to let you know when it's running
cons: Runs long on a normal cycle

customer_reviews.title: Replaced after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Installation did not go well, multiple problems over a 2 year period. Repairs difficult because we live in a rural area. Broke down again and after only 2 years we decided to replace it. Not worth the trouble. Never had so many problems with a dishwasher before.
customer_reviews.author: Rand Al Thor

customer_reviews.title: Great Dish Washer, with an extra tray.
customer_reviews.text: Was shipped and received in no time. First time running I thought it was not on but the red light was on and putting a ear to the washer I could hear it. Very quiet ! Yes I would buy again !
customer_reviews.author: The bIG GUY

customer_reviews.title: Great top-of-the-line dishwasher.
customer_reviews.text: So far we have been very happy with this dishwash. It is very quiet. The dishracks are well placed. Does a great job cleaning. Husband easily installed the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: RedworkRene

customer_reviews.title: super clean
customer_reviews.text: The best dishwasher we have ever had. The only one to buy
customer_reviews.author: John Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet all I hear is the water pumping out.When the light shines on on the floor its running.
customer_reviews.author: George Lehman

customer_reviews.title: Loading
customer_reviews.text: The dishwasher is difficult to use. Loading is not intuitive
customer_reviews.author: margaret cinberg

customer_reviews.title: Extremely quiet
customer_reviews.text: My only issue with this dishwasher is it seems very small inside and awkward to load. Very quiet and does a great job cleaning on all cycles.
customer_reviews.author: Dino

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely silent operation
customer_reviews.text: It is a good thing this unit projects a light on the floor when it is in operation, because otherwise you would not know it was running. The unit did not come with everything needed for the hoses to match up with my previous installation, and it was more expensive than others, but very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Antonio Michelena

customer_reviews.title: Reliable abd dependable super quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Lobe Bosch dishwashers. Super quiet and reliable. Last one lasted 10 years with no issues until the motor burnt out..
customer_reviews.author: Pat Byrnes

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet and cleans great
customer_reviews.text: Great dishwasher very good drying but not great at drying
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Clements

customer_reviews.title: Just OK, mediocre, disappointing
customer_reviews.text: It is an ok dishwasher at best. Mediocre cleaning. Disappointing performance. It is very quiet. The buttons are horrific. Have to push start over and over till you hit it just right-frustrating. Expected more from a Bosch product. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice dishwasher. The adjustable upper rack is great
customer_reviews.text: Nice dishwasher. The adjustable upper rack is great. Lower rack is setup different than I'm use to. Mine came minus the the clips that hold in the toe kick plate. Which I could get them.
customer_reviews.author: Marge N

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: Hate it. It constantly gets error code E15 which means you have to pull it out a drain the water. Did this from the first week. Bosch customer service was crap, told me to fill out a customer survey. Need a new stove I like the bosh but will never purchase anything from them again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a horrible dishwasher;  do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: The dishwasher did not dry the dishes, only 2 months old. Dishes left in the dishwasher one day after the cleaning cycle became moldy, with water in the bottom. Two service calls AND NO RESOVE. Bosch customer service is non existent. Four different representatives, four different answers . The dishwasher was inspected today and the service representative diagnosed a bad dishwasher, however his report was a an anthesis to his verbal analysis in our home. What a waste of our day waiting for an incompetent individual who did not even run the dishwasher. Never, never buy a Bosch. Bad product and absolutely no customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Holly bergman

customer_reviews.title: After weeks of research on youtube, this was worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used It I could see a difference from my old GE dishwasher. all of the tall glasses were clear. I holds a lot more utensils and has an adjustable rack for taller glasses. The only thing I didn't like was the water hook up was done out side of the cabinets and then pushed in. My old was one was done after it was in the cabinets and connected in the bottom front. I couldn't see if there was a possible leak except by looking into the gap along the left and right sides. I would have preferred a factory hose that connected inside the sink cabinet, like the electrical.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: WORST EVER
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE WORST DISHWASHER I EVER HAD !! IT DOESN T CLEAN NOR DOES IT DRY !!! IT S CYCLE HAS AN OBNOXIOUS BELL THAT WILL WAKE YOU UP IN THE MIDDLE OF THE NIGHT IF YOU START IT AFTER YOU GO TO BED. I THREW IT IN THE TRASH AND GOT A NEW ONE. DID NOT EVEN BOTHER TO GIVE IT AWAY. THE WHEELS OF THE BOTTOM RACK KEEP POPPING OFF ! UNREAL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If I could give it zreo stars I would
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Bosch Dishwasher 3 months ago have not gotten it to run 1 time!!! NOT ONCE! they have send out 3 different repair techs and still not working. They are now are refusing to exchange the dishwasher and are asking me to let them try and repair it a 4th time.... This is our 5th Bosch product and will for sure be our last. DO NOT BUY BOSCH if you are looking for customer service because they have none!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Pilote

customer_reviews.title: Alternative and better place for tableware = more space on bottom rack!
customer_reviews.text: Loving this dishwasher! Bought this one because it has 1) touch controls (not buttons, which are moving parts vulnerable to wear and water intrusion) and 2) has legitimate and fully functional tableware drawer on top (unlike the KitchenAid which is largely useless) that frees up all that basket space on the bottom rack so we can put salad bowls and other big items there. A bunch more capacity for large items, a better way to wash forks and spoons and knives (also safer than blades and tines sometimes pointed upwards).
customer_reviews.author: Leapfrog

customer_reviews.title: Great dishwasher except for third top rack
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately we drink wine in glasses with stems, not long ones, just normal. The dishwasher has a third top rack for utensils to be loaded flat. And unfortunately that rack can not be removed. The middle rack can be lowered only one notch, and it’s not enough for wine glasses to fit. So, wine glasses have to be put in on their side, which takes up lots of space and leaves them full of water when the cycle is done. Not very satisfactory. I guess I should have brought a wine glass to the store before I bought it. Just a warning for those who,use stemmed glasses...
customer_reviews.author: Magari

product_meta.title: Bosch SHX878WD5N 800 Series Built In Dishwasher with 6 Wash Cycles, 3rd Rack, Delay Start, RackMatic in Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: The 24 800 Series Built-In Bar Handle Dishwasher from Bosch will be the best addition to your place The spacious stainless steel tall tub can hold up to 16 place settings At 42 dBA this dishwasher operates quietly

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars34 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
